title: I Can't Wait For School To Start
itunes:title: I Can't Wait For School To Start
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I recently found out that my 17 year old son had sex for the first time. He's entering his senior year in high school and his girlfriend graduated last year. I overheard my son telling his friend about the whole thing and I was devastated. But there is another level to this story. I read my son’s texts and found out that his girlfriend’s mother knew about them having sex and allowed them to have sex in her home. I asked my son about it and apparently, the girlfriend’s mom was part of the plan all along and “counseled” them beforehand..........

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I recently found out that my 17 year old son had sex for the first time. He's entering his senior year in high school and his girlfriend graduated last year. I overheard my son telling his friend about the whole thing and I was devastated. But there is another level to this story. I read my son’s texts and found out that his girlfriend’s mother knew about them having sex and allowed them to have sex in her home. I asked my son about it and apparently, the girlfriend’s mom was part of the plan all along and “counseled” them beforehand..........
